item.title: Fruit Tingles
item.description: ‚ùñ This image is a website-exclusive sketch produced as a masthead for the November Patreon update. The typeface in this image is a preview version “Nay Aug” by Alex Tomlinson, who you can follow here. Fruit Tingles (Fodsa Spas) are a chalky sweet popular in Vekllei. They fizz in your mouth and come in several flavours. They’re as popular today as they were a hundred and fifty years ago when they were first produced by Montre Confectionary in 1936.
